author: igv4321
body:
This is a clone of PR #16067 which was abandoned due to a merge gone bad.

Compared to PR #16067, this PR removes the file CondTools/Hcal/interface/instantiateEosTemplates.h, relying instead on essentially identical existing file CondFormats/Serialization/src/templateInstantiations.cc (of course, with the same support for various boost versions). Thanks to David for pointing this out.

This PR does not modify any existing code and, of course, is not expected to modify any physics results. Please test and merge asap.
title: Environment for creating and visualizing HFPhase1PMTParams conditions
